product_name: Nite Ize Stainless-Steel S-Biner Size 0.5 - Package of 2
long_description: Small but mighty, the Nite Ize Stainless-Steel S-Biner size 0.5 is a unique double-clip carabiner that offers a great way to manage your keys or other items. Dual hook design with opposing gates allows you to easily link 2 items together. Rugged stainless steel and secure gate closure stand up to years of heavy use. The Nite Ize Stainless-Steel S-Biner size .05 is rated to hold up to 3 lbs.
short_description: Small but mighty, the Nite Ize Stainless-Steel S-Biner size 0.5 is a unique double-clip carabiner that offers a great way to manage your keys or other items.
